title: Interested in a one year mega project
body:
Royal allegiance is interested in picking up 5 coaches in training or looking for experience or someone with experience 

The work is going to require alot of dedication , you will need to have the drive the succeed and obviously alot of hard work.

It wont be too overwhelming and if it succeeds there maybe a potential for pay.

If you are someone who is committed and finishes what they started I want to hear from you. 

If interested add Wolves

http://raesports.webs.com/

replies.body: Says your Friends list is maxed out so ill put up a post. Coaching has been a hobby of mine since cs 1.6 and some other games, but league is a whole new level. I think im up for the challenge :)
Hey I have created space in my friends list for people wanting to add me. I will be in touch shortly
Currently in Bronze(ex-silver) (don't know if i will be any better than anyone else) played since season 3. I have a couple of hours to waste doing something.
I'm down, I have a lot of spare time at the moment so hit me up.
